CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL( aecm__Proactivity_Index__c , "Not Acknowledged")), 1, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Proactivity_Index__c, "Reactive")), 2, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Proactivity_Index__c, "Occasionally Proactive")), 3, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Proactivity_Index__c, "Situationally Proactive")), 4, IF ( AND(aecm__Active__c = True, ISPICKVAL(aecm__Proactivity_Index__c, "Intentionally Proactive")), 5, 0 )))))
/*CASE( Proactivity_Index__c , "Not Acknowledged", 1, "Reactive", 2,"Occasionally Proactive",3,"Situationally Proactive",4,"Intentionally Proactive",5,0)*/
CustomField.label: Proactivity Index Score
